name: Carnival Penguin
cardText: Whenever you play your third Action this Cycle,|choose a Penguin with vibe 6 or less.|Ice that Penguin.||

name: Chef Penguin
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action, you get a Fishsicle.|(A Fishsicle produces one _T_, then goes away).|||

name: Chub, Who Lives for Action
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action,|put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Chubopolis Unleashed
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action, put 2 vibe counters|on this Penguin. When this Penguin is iced from play,|draw cards equal to half the number of vibe counters| on this Penguin rounded up.|

name: Insomniac Penguin
cardText: Whenever you play an Action, unflop this Penguin.||||

name: Juggling Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.|This Penguin doesn't unflop at the Unfloppening.|At the end of Action Time, if you played an Action,|unflop this Penguin.|

name: Keyturning Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|look at the top card of your deck.|You may put it on the bottom of your deck.||

name: Mukbang Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|the next time you would draw a card, skip it.|||

name: Peace Out Penguin
cardText: This Penguin can only [ACT]|if you've played a Red Action this Cycle.|[ACT] _F_: Choose up to two Penguins with|total vibe 10 or less. Ice those Penguins|and this Penguin.

name: Popcorn Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|ice the Penguin in play that's vibing the least.|If there's a tie, you pick.||

name: Red Mega Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Penguin in your huddle. Whenever an Action|is played that chooses this Penguin, copy that Action.|(You make new choices for the copy).|

name: Red Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.||||

name: Ribbon-Dancing Penguin
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action,|this Penguin can produce _R__R_ for the rest of this Cycle.|||

name: Risk-Taking Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|choose a Penguin with vibe 6 or less and flip a coin.|If heads, return the chosen Penguin|to its owner's hand.|

name: Run-It-Back Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Pick a Red Action card in your ice|and return it to your hand. Ice this Penguin.|||

name: Screaming Penguin
cardText: Whenever you play an Action,|boost this Penguin's vibe by 2|for the rest of this Cycle.||

name: Serene Penguin
cardText: Whenever your opponent plays an Action,|flop this Penguin.|||

name: Striking Swordsman Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: This Penguin can't be iced this Cycle.||||

name: A Drop in Attention
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's the fourth|Action you've played this Cycle.|Ice all Penguins.||

name: Again, Again
cardText: The next time you play an Action|with Pudge cost _R__R_ this Cycle, copy that Action.|(You make new choices for the copy).||

name: Bearish Sentiment
cardText: Choose a Penguin.|It loses all abilities for the rest of this Cycle.|Draw a card.||

name: Best Seats in the House
cardText: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.||||

name: Grow Together
cardText: Each player may choose a Penguin.|Put a vibe counter on each of those Penguins.|Draw a card.||

name: Have an Encore
cardText: You can only play this Action|if you've played another Red Action this Cycle.|Choose up to two Red Penguins in your huddle|and unflop those Penguins. Draw a card.|

name: Heads I Win, Tails You Lose
cardText: Choose a player and flip a coin. If heads,|you draw a card. If tails, the chosen player|ices a card from their hand.||

name: Hit the High Note
cardText: Choose a Relic and return it to its owner's hand.|Draw a card.|||

name: Not a Rod Anymore!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down|as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it.|Choose a Penguin and boost its vibe|by 2 for the rest of this Cycle.|

name: Put on a Show
cardText: Choose a Penguin with vibe 10 or greater.|Ice that Penguin.|||

name: Stand in the Rain
cardText: Unflop all Penguins. Draw a card.||||

name: Sunburn a Penguin
cardText: Choose a Penguin with vibe|4 or less. Ice that Penguin.|||

name: Trust Fall
cardText: Choose a Penguin.|Reduce its vibe by 2 for the rest of this Cycle.|If that Penguin has 0 vibe, it can't be iced this Cycle.|Draw a card.|

name: Use Whoopee Cushion
cardText: Choose a Penguin with vibe 10 or greater.|Reduce its vibe by 4 for the rest of this Cycle.|Draw a card.||

name: Dashing Swordsman Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time, if you don't have|the Baron, boost this Penguin's vibe by 4|for the rest of this Cycle.||

name: Daydreaming Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin with vibe 2 or less.|Ice that Penguin and ice this Penguin.|||

name: Extrovert Penguin
cardText: Whenever another Penguin enters your huddle,|put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Hyper Penguin
cardText: Whenever a Penguin in your huddle wins|Vibe Check, reveal the top card of your deck.|If it's a Yellow Penguin card, put it into your hand.|If you do, ice a card from your hand.|

name: Jubilant Penguin
cardText: Whenever a Penguin in your huddle|wins Vibe Check, draw a card.|||

name: Lucky Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin is put in your ice from play,|you may pick a Yellow Penguin card in your ice|with vibe 2 or less and put it into your huddle.||

name: Mysterious Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|if there are four or more Yellow Penguins|in your huddle including this one,|choose a Penguin and flop it.|

name: Napengulon, Legendary Host
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|put vibe counters on this Penguin equal to|the number of Yellow Penguins in your huddle.

name: Paper Penguin
cardText: Whenever another Rock, Paper, or Scissor Penguin|enters a huddle, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.|Rock Penguins do not participate in Vibe Check.||

name: Penguin That Doesn't Mind Goodbyes
cardText: Whenever another Yellow Penguin|in your huddle is iced, draw a card.|||

name: Penguin Who Might Bring a Plus One
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|reveal the top card of your deck. If it's|a Penguin card with Fish cost 2 or less,|draw it. If not, put it on the bottom|of your deck.

name: Penguin Who Spills the Tea
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Pick a Yellow Penguin card in your ice|with vibe 4 or less. Return it to your hand|and return this Penguin to its owner's hand.||

name: Penguin Who Zooms
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|return a non-Speedy Penguin from your huddle|to its owner's hand.||

name: Penguin Who's Late to the Party
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|if your huddle has at least three more Penguins|than your opponent's huddle including this Penguin,|it enters with 6 vibe counters.|

name: Shocking Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|return each other Penguin in your huddle|to its owner's hand.||

name: Pot-Stirring Penguin
cardText: As long as your huddle has three or more Penguins,|including this one, this Penguin can produce _Y__Y_.|||

name: Rock Penguin
cardText: Whenever another Rock, Paper, or Scissor Penguin|enters a huddle, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.|Scissors Penguins do not participate in Vibe Check.||

name: Scissors Penguin
cardText: Whenever another Rock, Paper, or Scissor Penguin|enters a huddle, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.|Paper Penguins do not participate in Vibe Check.||

name: Shapenguzad
cardText: Enters flopped.|When this Penguin enters the huddle, move all|vibe counters from all Penguins in your huddle|onto this Penguin.|

name: Pleepem, Who Stands Alone
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|put 2 vibe counters on it for each other|Yellow Penguin in your huddle.||

name: Shy Penguin
cardText: You can only play this Penguin|if you've played another Penguin this turn.|||

name: Yellow Mega Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Penguin in your huddle. When this Penguin|enters the huddle, reveal the top card of your deck.|If it's a Yellow Penguin card, put it into your huddle.|

name: Yellow Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.||||

name: Buddy Up
cardText: For the rest of this Cycle,|Yellow Penguins in your huddle gain the ability|"[ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin and flop it".||

name: Check the Yellow Pages
cardText: Reveal the top three cards of your deck.|Put all the Yellow Penguin cards you reveal|into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom|of your deck in any order.|

name: Put Your Flippers in the Air
cardText: Choose a Penguin.|Boost its vibe by twice the number of|Yellow Penguins in your huddle|for the rest of this Cycle.|

name: Join the Trend
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your huddle and ice it.|Turn the top card of your deck into a Rod.|Return this Action to your hand.||

name: Not Your Keys
cardText: Choose a Penguin and ice it.||||

name: Prepare for a Wild Night
cardText: Reveal the top five cards of your deck.|Put all the Action cards you reveal into your hand.| Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.||

name: They're Twins
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your huddle.|Search your deck for a Penguin card|with the same name and put it into your hand.|Shuffle your deck.|

name: What a Twist!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down|as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it.|Choose a Penguin and unflop it.||

name: Yum Yum
cardText: Ice all Penguins.||||

name: Balanced Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _G__G_, _F_: You get a Fishsicle.|(A Fishsicle produces one _T_, then goes away).|||

name: Flower-Arranging Penguin
cardText: Whenever a Penguin in your huddle wins Vibe Check,|put two vibe counters on that Penguin.|||

name: Green Mega Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Penguin in your huddle. This Penguin can't|be chosen by anything. At the start of Action Time,|put a vibe counter on this Penguin.|

name: Green Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.||||

name: Karate Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a card from your hand.|||

name: Peppy Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|if this Penguin has vibe 6 or greater,|boost its vibe by 6 for the rest of this Cycle.||

name: Ornate Swordsman Penguin
cardText: Whenever this Penguin wins Vibe Check,|each opponent chooses a Penguin in their huddle.|Ice those Penguins.||

name: Penguin in Color
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|you get a Fishsicle. (A Fishsicle produces one _T_,|then goes away).||

name: Penguin Who Is the Garden
cardText: Whenever this Penguin wins Vibe Check,|the loser of Vibe Check skips the next time|they would draw a card.||

name: Penguin Whose Garden Grows
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|if another Penguin in your huddle is, or is tied with,|the Penguin in play that's vibing the most,|boost this Penguin's vibe by 6|for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Penguin With Great Mystique
cardText: This Penguin doesn't participate in Vibe Check.|[ACT] _F_: Put 6 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Koi Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|choose a Penguin with the highest vibe in your huddle|and put vibe counters on it until it's tied|for the highest vibe among all Penguins.|

name: Sketching Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time, choose a Penguin|and boost its vibe by 4 for the rest of this Cycle.|If you lose or tie Vibe Check, ice Sketching Penguin.||

name: Sliding Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time, choose a Penguin|and boost its vibe by 2 for the rest of this Cycle.|||

name: Stargazing Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|choose a Penguin with vibe 6 or less|and put a vibe counter on it.||

name: Success Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose another Penguin in your huddle.|Boost that Penguin's vibe by 6 for the rest of this Cycle|and ice this Penguin.||

name: Window-Washing Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|choose a Penguin in your huddle|and put 4 vibe counters on it.||

name: Chisel from Stone
cardText: Choose a Green Penguin in your huddle.|Count its vibe, divide it by four, and round up.|Draw that many cards.||

name: Clean Up Good
cardText: Choose a Green Penguin in your huddle.|Unflop it and double its vibe|for the rest of this Cycle.||

name: Escape in Time
cardText: Cancel an [ACT] or Action|that chooses a Penguin in your huddle.|||

name: Everybody Stay Clam
cardText: Flop all Penguins in play. Draw a card.||||

name: Got 'Em!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down|as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it.|Choose a Penguin with vibe 2 or less.|Ice that Penguin.|

name: Lost in the Sauce
cardText: Choose a Penguin and put 2 vibe counters on it.||||

name: Raid the Snacks
cardText: You get two Fishsicles.|(A Fishsicle produces one _T_, then goes away).|||

name: Luca Saves the Penguins
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your opponent's huddle.|It joins your huddle.|||

name: Send Off
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your huddle. Ice that Penguin.|You get Fishsicles equal to half that Penguin's vibe,|rounded up. (A Fishsicle produces one _T_,|then goes away).|

name: Too Cool for School
cardText: You can only play this Action if there's|a Penguin in your huddle that's vibing more than|your opponent's highest vibing Penguin|by 6 or more. Ice all Penguins.|

name: Walk the Runway
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your huddle|and a Penguin in your opponent's huddle.|Ice the one that's vibing the least.|If there's a tie, ice them both.|

name: You Dropped This
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Action,|ice a Penguin in your huddle with vibe|6 or greater. Choose a Penguin and put|6 vibe counters on it.|

name: Bashful Swordsman Penguin
cardText: Whenever a Penguin wins Vibe Check,|if this Penguin is unflopped, ice that Penguin.|(They still win Vibe Check).||

name: Blue Mega Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Penguin in your huddle. You can look|at the top card of your deck at any time.|If it's a Relic card, you can play it.|

name: Blue Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.||||

name: Bottle Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Ice the top card of each player's deck.||||

name: Cannonball Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, choose a player.|Ice the top three cards of their deck.|||

name: Thawing Penguin
cardText: Penguins can't win Vibe Check|unless their vibe is greater than four times|the number of Thawing Penguins in your huddle.||

name: Dragonrider Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|you may pick a card in your opponent's ice|and put it on top of their deck.||

name: Fact-Finding Penguin
cardText: Whenever an Action card|is put in your opponent's ice from their deck,|put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.||

name: Jealous Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|pick a Penguin card in your opponent's ice|and put that card on top of this one. This Penguin|inherits all characteristics of that card.|

name: Miss Chief, Keeper of Keys
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose an opponent. Ice cards|from the top of their deck equal to|half this Penguin's vibe, rounded up.||

name: Miss Place, Forgetter of Things
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|pick a card in your opponent's ice.|Cards with the same name as that card can't be|played while this Penguin is in your huddle.|

name: Painter Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|pick four Action cards in your ice and put them|on the bottom of your deck.||

name: Penguin Caught in Fishing Line
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Flop all Penguins. Ice this Penguin.||||

name: Penguin Who Explores the Reef
cardText: Whenever a Penguin in your huddle|wins Vibe Check, choose an opponent.|Ice cards from the top of that player's deck|equal to half that Penguin's vibe, rounded up.|

name: Penguin Who's OK
cardText: Whenever you draw a card, choose a player.|Ice the top card of their deck.|||

name: Penguin With Hoops
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Each player draws a card.||||

name: Porthole Penguin
cardText: Whenever you lose the Baron,|look at the top card of your opponent's deck.|You may put it on the bottom of their deck.||

name: Rad Chill, Who's Super Cool
cardText: Enters flopped.|[ACT] _F_: Choose an opponent.|Ice cards from the top of their deck|equal to the number of cards|that player already has in their ice.

name: Sneaky Penguin
cardText: At the start of your turn,|look at the top card of your deck.|You may put it on the bottom of your deck.||

name: Tidal Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose an opponent and ice all cards|in their hand. They draw that many cards, then|ice that many cards from the top of their deck.||

name: Waterfall Penguin
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|if you don't have the Baron, choose an opponent.|Ice the top three cards of their deck.||

name: Bedtime Story
cardText: Choose a Penguin with vibe less than|or equal to twice the number of Penguin cards|its controller has in their ice. Ice that Penguin.||

name: Bridge With Layer Zero
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your opponent's huddle.|Swap it with a Penguin card in its owner's ice.|(That Penguin enters the huddle, but is not played).||

name: Cool Story Bro!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down|as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. Choose|a player and ice the top two cards of their deck.||

name: Don't Trust, Verify
cardText: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck.|If it's the named card, put it into your hand|and draw an additional card. Otherwise,|put it back on top of your deck.|

name: Ingenious Idea
cardText: Draw two cards. Pick a card in your hand|and put it on top of your deck.|||

name: Keep Digging
cardText: Choose an opponent. They reveal their hand.|Pick a non-Penguin card from it and ice that card.|||

name: Questionable Methods
cardText: Pick an Action card in your opponent's ice.|Until the end of this Cycle, you can play that Action.|You can spend Pudge of any color to play that Action.||

name: Send It Too Hard
cardText: You can only play this Action|if your opponent has fifteen or more|cards in their ice. Ice all Penguins.||

name: Spring a Leak
cardText: Choose an Action and cancel it.||||

name: Three Wise Penguins
cardText: Choose two Rods you don't control|and return each to its owner's hand.|||

name: Unlikely Friends
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your opponent's huddle.|That player may ice cards from the top of their deck|equal to that Penguin's vibe. If they do not,| ice that Penguin.|

name: Absent-Minded Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin in your huddle and ice it.|Put two vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Abstract Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_, Ice a card from your hand:|Put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Ambitious Penguin
cardText: Whenever a player plays an Action,|if this Penguin is unflopped and|you have less than fifteen cards in your ice,| return this Penguin to its owner's hand.|

name: Ascending Penguin
cardText: Whenever a Penguin enters your huddle,|ice cards from the top of your deck equal to|half that Penguin's vibe, rounded up.||

name: Bizmo, PhD Candidate
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|if you have no cards in your deck,|you win the game.||

name: Brainy Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|ice up to two cards in your hand.|Draw that many cards.||

name: Bubbles, the Great and Powerful
cardText: This Penguin's vibe is equal to|twice the number of Penguin cards in your ice.|||

name: Bunkus, Who Is the Stars
cardText: Playable from ice. As you play Bunkus,|put any number of cards from your ice on the bottom|of your deck to reduce Bunkus' cost by that amount.|Bunkus' vibe is twice the number of|Penguin cards in your ice.

name: Charming Swordsman Penguin
cardText: This Penguin can only [ACT] if its vibe is,|or is tied with, the highest vibe in your huddle.|[ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin|in your opponent's huddle and flop it.|

name: Cooking Penguin
cardText: Playable from ice by icing a Rod you control|in addition to paying its Fish cost.|||

name: Demolition Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|you may pick a card in your ice.|If you do, put it face-down as a Rod|and ice a Rod you control.|

name: Galaxy Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|search your deck for a Penguin card|and put it in your ice. Shuffle your deck.||

name: Gardenkeeper Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|pick five cards in your ice and put them|on the bottom of your deck. When this Penguin|enters the huddle, ice the top five cards of your deck.|

name: Penguin With a Flag
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Rod you control.|||

name: Penguin Who Breaks the Fourth Wall
cardText: You can't play this Penguin from your|hand. Playable from ice by icing two Rods|you control in addition to paying its Fish cost.||

name: Penguin Who Carries the Berg
cardText: Whenever one of your Rods is iced from play,|put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Penguin Who Runs the Lift
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|if there are eight or more cards in your ice,|boost this Penguin's vibe by 6|for the rest of this Cycle.|

name: Prosperous Penguin
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|you may pick an Action card in your ice with|Pudge cost 2. If you do, you can play it this Cycle.|(You must still pay its costs).|

name: Purple Mega Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a Penguin in your huddle. When this Penguin|enters the huddle, you may pick a card in your ice|and put it into your hand.|

name: Purple Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.||||

name: Space Cadet Penguin
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Penguin,|ice a card from your hand. When this Penguin|enters the huddle, choose a Rod you control|and a Rod you don't control. Ice those Rods.|

name: Adventure Squad
cardText: Choose a Penguin in your huddle|and a Penguin in your opponent's huddle.|Ice the one that's vibing the most.|If there's a tie, ice them both.|

name: Change Perspective
cardText: Reveal the top three cards of your deck.|Your opponent separates those into two groups.|Pick one group and put it into your hand.|Ice the cards in the other group.|

name: Chase Your Dreams
cardText: You can't play this Action from your hand.|Playable from ice. Draw a card, then put this Action|on the bottom of your deck.||

name: Gather Together
cardText: Pick a Penguin card in your ice. During your next turn,|you can play that card by icing a Rod you control|in addition to paying its Fish cost.||

name: Have a Philosophical Debate
cardText: Choose a Penguin. You may move cards|from your ice to the bottom of your deck|equal to that Penguin's Fish cost.|If you do, ice that Penguin.|

name: One With History
cardText: Return all Penguin cards in your ice to your hand.||||

name: Overwhelm With Knowledge
cardText: Playable from ice by icing a Rod you control|instead of paying this card's Pudge cost.|If you play this Action from your ice,|put this card on the bottom of your deck.|Draw a card.

name: Sick Pull!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down|as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it.|Each player draws a card.||

name: Spring Break
cardText: You can only play this Action if you have|fifteen or more cards in your ice.|Ice all Penguins.||

name: Study All Night
cardText: Draw two cards. Ice two cards from your hand.||||

name: Wut?
cardText: When this card is put in your ice,|ice the top card of your deck.|||

name: Aha Penguin
cardText: Whenever an opponent wins Vibe Check,|put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.|||

name: Boat-Tying Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin with vibe|equal to or less than the number of|Penguins in your huddle and put|2 vibe counters on it.|

name: Hungry Penguin
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin with vibe greater than|this Penguin's vibe and flop it.|||

name: Inquisitive Penguin
cardText: This Penguin doesn't participate in Vibe Check.||||

name: Introvert Penguin
cardText: This Penguin doesn't participate in Vibe Check|unless it's the only Penguin in your huddle.|||

name: Primo Wizard Penguin
cardText: Enters flopped.|This Penguin can produce _RB_ of any color.|||

name: Penguin With a Rod of His Own
cardText: Enters flopped.|This Penguin can produce _T_ as if it were a Rod.|||

name: Teleporter Penguin
cardText: At the start of your turn,|ice all Penguins with vibe 4 or less.|This Penguin can't have vibe counters placed on it.||

name: Skydiving Penguin
cardText: Whenever the Baron changes sides, draw a card.||||

name: Supportive Friend
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle,|you may choose a Penguin|and put 2 vibe counters on it.||

name: Chalice of Everflowing Pudge
cardText: When you play this Relic, pick a color.|Penguins in your huddle can produce Pudge of that color.|||

name: Cookies of Truth
cardText: Players play with the top card|of their deck revealed.|||

name: Dummy Thicc Disco Ball
cardText: At the start of your turn, return all Penguins|in your opponent's huddles to their owner's hands.|||

name: Inspiring Story
cardText: At the start of Action Time, boost the vibe|of every Penguin in your huddle by 2|for the rest of this Cycle.||

name: Layer Two Technology
cardText: All Penguin cards cost one less _T_ to play.||||

name: Orb of Hopium
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|each player draws a card.|||

name: Silent Snow Globe
cardText: All Penguins lose all abilities.|You can't play additional Penguins|as long as this Relic remains in play.|(Penguins can still produce Pudge).|

name: The End of the Rainbow
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|if your huddle contains a Penguin of each color,|draw a card.||

name: Too Much Caffeine
cardText: At the start of Action Time,|each player may choose a Penguin.|Flop those Penguins.||

name: Wizard Cap
cardText: Whenever a Wizard Penguin produces Pudge,|they produce another Pudge of that same color.|||

name: Bounce House Rod
cardText: Enters flopped.|When you play this Rod, return|a Rod you control to its owner's hand.|(You can look at your face-down Rods at any time).|

name: Calligraphy Rod
cardText: You can only play this Rod if you control|five or more Rods. Whenever you play|your second Penguin this Cycle,|unflop this Rod.|

name: Freezing Rod
cardText: This Rod produces _T__T_.|Whenever you use this Rod, ice a Rod you control.|||

name: Hot Rod
cardText: You can only play this Rod if you control|five or more Rods. At the start of Action Time,|boost the vibe of the Penguin in your huddle|with the highest vibe by 1 for the rest of this Cycle.|If there's a tie, you pick.

name: Pudgy Man Rod
cardText: Whenever another one of your rods is iced from play|unflop this rod.

name: Rod of Camaraderie
cardText: Enters flopped.|As an additional cost to play this Rod,|ice three unflopped Rods you control.|This Rod produces _T_ for each Penguin in your huddle.|

name: Umbrella Rod
cardText: You can only play this Rod if you control|five or more Rods. Whenever you play|your fourth Action each Cycle, copy it.|(You make new choices for the copy).|

name: Rod of Cheesy Slices
cardText: You can only play this Rod if you control|five or more Rods. Whenever you use this Rod,|choose an opponent and ice the top two cards|of their deck.|

name: Trampoline Rod
cardText: Enters flopped.|When you play this Rod, return a Penguin|in your huddle to its owner's hand.||

name: Rod of Charming Melodies
cardText: You can only play this Rod if you control|five or more Rods. Whenever you use this Rod,|ice the top two cards of your deck.||

name: Lil Shaker
cardText: [ACT] _F_, pick two cards in your ice and put them on the bottom of your deck: Choose a Red Penguin. That Penguin produces _R__R__R_ for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Lil Who Breaks Free
cardText: Whenever this Penguin leaves the huddle, draw a card.

name: Lil Daydreamer
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Penguin with vibe 3 or less. Ice that Penguin and ice this Penguin.

name: The Lord of Lightning
cardText: Whenever a Lil in your huddle is flopped, boost this Penguin's vibe by 1 for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Lil Singer
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose another unflopped Penguin in your huddle and flop it. Put a vibe counter on that Penguin.

name: Squibblestone the Wise
cardText: [ACT] _R__B_, _F_: Choose a flopped Lil and ice it.

name: Lil Comic
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, choose a player. That player reveals their hand. You may pick a Penguin card from their hand and ice it. If you do, that player draws a card.

name: Penguin Who Shakes
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action, put a vibe counter on this Penguin. As long as it has 3 or more vibe counters, it produces _R__R__R_ and has  the ability "Whenever this Penguin is flopped, remove 3 vibe counters from it".

name: Lil Introvert
cardText: Whenever this Penguin is flopped, boost its vibe by 7 for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Simon Smasher
cardText: This Penguin can only [ACT] if you've played a Red Action this Cycle. [ACT] _F_: Choose a Relic and ice it.

name: Lil Juggler
cardText: Enters flopped. [ACT] _F_: Choose an Action. Cancel it, return it to its owner's hand, and return this Penguin to its owner's hand.

name: Lil Zoomer
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, choose a non-Speedy Penguin and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Lil Insomniac
cardText: Whenever you play a Red Action, put vibe counters on this Penguin equal to the Pudge cost of that Action.

name: Pack Attack
cardText: Open a Vibes booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (A list of legal packs can be found at vibes.game/packattack).

name: Toss Up
cardText: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card. If tails, return this Action to your hand.

name: Honey, I Shrunk the Pengs
cardText: Choose a Penguin. That Penguin becomes a Lil for the rest of this Cycle. Draw a card.

name: Ride the Train
cardText: Draw a card. You may move any number of other cards named "Ride the Train" from your ice to the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card for each card moved this way.

name: Enter the Bounce House Dimension
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Action, return a Rod you control to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

name: Band Together
cardText: Search your deck for a Penguin card, reveal it, shuffle your deck, and put it on top.

name: Goodnight, Pengs
cardText: Your opponent's Actions and [ACT]s cannot ice or flop Penguins in your huddle for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Cross the River
cardText: Pick two non-Red Action cards in your ice and return them to your hand. This Action costs one less _R_ to play for each Action you've played this Cycle.

name: Sheeeesh!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. This Action does nothing. Whenever you play a Red Action, return this card from your ice to your hand.

name: Here's Pengy
cardText: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Draw a card.

name: Lil Paper
cardText: Whenever you win Vibe Check, put 2 vibe counters on each Scissors Penguin.

name: Lil Rock
cardText: Whenever you win Vibe Check, put 2 vibe counters on each Paper Penguin.

name: Lil Scissors
cardText: Whenever you win Vibe Check, put 2 vibe counters on each Rock Penguin.

name: Penguin With Lil Mystique
cardText: This Penguin doesn't participate in Vibe Check unless it has 6 or more vibe counters on it.

name: Poppin' Pete
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, you may choose a Relic with Fish cost 5 or less. If you do, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Lil Lifeguard
cardText: [ACT] _F_, remove a vibe counter from this Penguin: Choose a Penguin and put 2 vibe counters on it.

name: Lil Stargazer
cardText: Whenever this Penguin is chosen by anything, put a vibe counter on it.

name: Lil Extrovert
cardText: Whenever a Penguin in your huddle gets vibe counters from anything non-Silly, put a vibe counter on it.

name: Frosterous the Great
cardText: [ACT] _Y__G_, _F_: Choose a flopped Lil and ice it.

name: Lil Raker
cardText: [ACT] _F_, pick two cards in your ice and put them on the bottom of your deck: Choose a Penguin and put 2 vibe counters on it.

name: Lil Window Washer
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, you may flop up to four other Yellow Penguins in your huddle. If you do, put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin for each Penguin flopped this way.

name: Penguin Who Rakes
cardText: [ACT] _Y__Y__Y_, _F_: Choose a Penguin and put 3 vibe counters on it.

name: The Champion of Clouds
cardText: Whenever another Lil enters a huddle, put a vibe counter on that Lil and put a vibe counter on this Lil.

name: Josephine, Party Queen
cardText: [ACT] _F_: The next time you put a vibe counter on a Penguin this Cycle, draw a card.

name: Sir Waddlesworth
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, put 5 vibe counters on each Yellow Penguin in your huddle.

name: Flop, Drop, and Roll
cardText: Choose a Lil or choose a Penguin with vibe 6 or less. Flop it.

name: See the Berg
cardText: Choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it. Draw a card.

name: Be Merry and Go
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Action, remove all of the vibe counters on a Penguin in your huddle. Choose a Penguin with Fish cost less than or equal to the number of counters you removed this way and ice it.

name: Frolic
cardText: Choose three Penguins. Put 3 vibe counters on each of them.

name: Into the Night
cardText: Choose an Action with Pudge cost less than or equal to the number of Lils in your huddle and cancel it.

name: Do a Lil Math
cardText: Double the number of vibe counters on every Lil in your huddle.

name: Jeepers!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. Choose a Lil with no vibe counters. Return it to its owner's hand.

name: Wen?
cardText: Wen you draw this card, you may reveal it. If you do, choose up to one Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Lil Baker
cardText: [ACT] _F_, pick two cards in your ice and put them on the bottom of your deck: You get a Fishsicle.

name: Lil Skydiver
cardText: Whenever this Penguin wins Vibe Check, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Penguin Who Bakes
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Tubbins the Bold
cardText: [ACT] _G__P_, _F_: Choose a flopped Lil and ice it.

name: Lil Painter
cardText: Whenever you play your first Action each Cycle, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Samantha Feathers, Pop Idol
cardText: You can only pay this Penguin's Fish cost with Fishsicles.

name: Lil Chef
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, put a vibe counter on it. [ACT] _F_, remove a vibe counter from this Penguin: You get a Fishsicle.

name: The Savior of Skies
cardText: This Penguin's vibe is twice the number of Lils in your huddle.

name: Lil Who Can't Stop Eating
cardText: Whenever you use a Fishsicle, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.

name: Son of Lil
cardText: Whenever you get Fishsicles from anything non-Silly, you get an additional Fishsicle.

name: Dima the Destroyer
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Relic and ice it. If it was a Relic you controlled, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Lil Lodger
cardText: At the end of Action Time, put vibe counters on this Penguin equal to the number of Fishsicles you have.

name: Miss Tweeny
cardText: Whenever you win Vibe Check, double the number of Fishsicles you have.

name: Sir Vibesalil
cardText: Fishsicles used to pay this card's Fish cost count for 2 Fish. At the start of Action Time, draw a card.

name: Fishing Trip
cardText: Flop all Penguins in your huddle. You get a Fishsicle for each Green Penguin flopped this way.

name: Mystery of the Everlasting Fish
cardText: You get a Fishsicle. Whenever you use a Fishsicle, if this card is in your ice, return it to your hand.

name: Overwhelm With Fish
cardText: Choose a Penguin. If its vibe is equal to or less than the number of Fishsicles you have, ice it.

name: Be a Lil Evil
cardText: As an additional cost to play this Action, ice a card from your hand.  Choose an Action with a single choice, cancel it, and copy that Action. (You make new choices for the copy).

name: Be Weird and Silly
cardText: Choose an Action, cancel it, and return it to its owner's hand. Draw a card. You get a Fishsicle.

name: Capture the Moment
cardText: Choose a Penguin. Unflop it and put vibe counters on it equal to the number of Fishsicles you have.

name: Look Inside
cardText: Choose a Penguin, Relic, or Rod. Return it to its owner's hand. Its owner ices a card from their hand.

name: No Way!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. Choose a Penguin with vibe 3 or less and ice it.

name: Lil Gardenkeeper
cardText: Whenever a Location enters play, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Lil Who Hoops
cardText: At the end of Action Time, ice this Penguin. [ACT] _F_: Draw a card.

name: Lil Contemplator
cardText: Whenever any number of Lils become unflopped, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.

name: Lil Milkmaid
cardText: This Penguin's vibe is twice the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Lil Waker
cardText: [ACT] _F_, pick two cards in your ice and put them on the bottom of your deck: Choose a flopped non-Silly Penguin and unflop it.

name: Tina Who Tears
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, you may choose a Relic. If you do, turn it face-down as a Rod.

name: The Herald of Horizons
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Boost the vibe of every Lil in your huddle by 2 for the rest of this Cycle.

name: Lil Jelly
cardText: [ACT] _F_, ice a card from your hand: Draw a card.

name: Blizzby the Swift
cardText: [ACT] _B__Y_, _F_: Choose a flopped Lil and ice it.

name: Penguin Who Wakes
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a flopped non-Silly Lil and unflop it.

name: liL mOCkeR
cardText: Whenever this Penguin becomes unflopped, if it's not at the Unfloppening, choose a Penguin and flop it.

name: Marilyl
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, each player ices the top two cards of their deck.

name: Binkus, Who Eats the Stars
cardText: Playable from ice. As you play Binkus, put up to thirteen cards from your opponent's ice on the bottom of their deck to reduce Binkus' cost by that amount. Binkus' vibe is twice the number of Penguin cards in your opponent's ice.

name: Lil Dragonrider
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, pick up to two cards in your opponent's ice and put them on top of their deck in any order. (Your opponent knows the order).

name: Is This a Rod
cardText: Choose a Rod. Return it to its owner's hand. If it wasn't a Rod you owned, its owner gets a Fishsicle.

name: An Offer You Can't Refuse
cardText: Choose an unflopped Lil. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Ooo, Shiny
cardText: Choose a Lil or choose a Penguin with vibe 6 or less. At the end of Action Time, unflop that Penguin.

name: Tie Game
cardText: Each player ices a Penguin in their huddle.

name: Win the Race
cardText: Choose a flopped Penguin in your huddle and unflop it. Ice that Penguin at the end of this Cycle.

name: Go With the Flow
cardText: Each player draws cards equal to the number of unflopped Lils in their huddle.

name: Turn to Rod
cardText: Choose a Penguin and turn it face-down as a Rod.

name: Four of a Kind
cardText: Choose four Penguins in your huddle with the same name. You win the game.

name: Force of Lil
cardText: Choose an Action and cancel it. You may play this Action without paying its Pudge cost if there are at least five flopped Lils in your huddle.

name: Inconceivable!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. Choose a Lil and a non-Lil Penguin. Unflop those Penguins.

name: Lil Quaker
cardText: [ACT] _F_, pick two Location cards in your ice and put them on the bottom of your deck: Draw a card.

name: Penguin Who Quakes
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Relic card with Fish cost 4 or less, draw it. If not, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Lil Lucky
cardText: Whenever another Purple Penguin  in your huddle or a Relic you control is iced, you get a Fishsicle.

name: Lil Solo Adventurer
cardText: Whenever a Location enters play, draw a card. Whenever another Lil Solo Adventurer enters a huddle, ice this Penguin.

name: Lil Space Cadet
cardText: This Penguin's vibe is twice the number of Relic cards in your ice.

name: Lil Surprised
cardText: Whenever a Location enters play, put 2 vibe counters on this Penguin.

name: Becky Breaker
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Relic you don't control. Swap it with a Relic card in its owner's ice.

name: Pebblington the Brave
cardText: [ACT] _P__R_, _F_: Choose a flopped Lil and ice it.

name: Lil Detective
cardText: Whenever you draw a card, put a vibe counter on this Penguin.

name: Lil Lookout
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, search your deck for a Location card, reveal it, shuffle your deck, and put it second from the top.

name: The Warden of Wind
cardText: Whenever a Lil wins Vibe Check, its controller draws a card.

name: Be Big and Goofy
cardText: Choose a Lil. That Penguin is no longer a Lil for the rest of this Cycle. Draw a card.

name: Lil Who Slides
cardText: Whenever this Penguin is chosen, ice it.

name: Lil Who's Down Bad
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, each player draws a card.

name: Lil Drippy
cardText: This Penguin can only [ACT] if you control a Location. [ACT] _F_: Pick a Location card in your ice with a different name than the Location in play. Put it into play.

name: Petite Pourer
cardText: Whenever you play a Relic, choose a Penguin and flop it.

name: Lil Who Scoops
cardText: When this Penguin enters the huddle, each player may ice a Relic they control. If they do, they draw a card.

name: Phone Home
cardText: Choose a Penguin and a Location. Ice the one with the lower Fish cost. If there's a tie, ice them both.

name: Throw Some Snow
cardText: Choose a Penguin with an [ACT]. Ice that Penguin.

name: Distract
cardText: Pick a card in your ice. Return it to your hand.

name: Cheeky Sidequest
cardText: Choose a Location. Search your deck for a Location card with Fish cost 1 greater than the chosen Location's Fish cost. Put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

name: Pudgticate
cardText: Ice all Relics.

name: Not Today!
cardText: You can only play this Action if it's face-down as a Rod. Flip this card over to play it. Choose an Action and cancel it. Its controller draws two cards.

name: Build a Burrito
cardText: Choose an Action and cancel it. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Layer a Lasagna
cardText: Choose a Lil with vibe 5 or less or a non-Lil Penguin with vibe 5 or greater and ice it.

name: Flip a Flapjack
cardText: Choose a Lil with vibe 1. Return it to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

name: Melt a Marshmallow
cardText: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Pick one and draw it. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Dunk a Donut
cardText: Pick an Action card in your ice. Until the end of this Cycle, you can play that Action. If that Action would be put into your ice this Cycle, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: Lil Bellyacher
cardText: [ACT] _F_, ice another Penguin in your huddle: Search your deck for a Lil Penguin card with Fish cost  1 greater than the Fish cost of the Penguin you iced. Put it into your huddle. Shuffle your deck.

name: Penguin Whose Belly Aches
cardText: [ACT] _F_: Choose a Rod you control and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Opera House
cardText: At the start of Action Time, each player with exactly six cards in their hand draws a card. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Mount Fuji
cardText: When this Relic enters play, each player names a Penguin card. Penguins with those names lose all abilities. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Half Past Chill
cardText: When this Relic enters play, choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Glow and Behold
cardText: When this Relic enters play, choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Feather Forecast
cardText: When this Relic enters play, choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Statue of Liberty
cardText: When this Relic enters play, each player chooses a Penguin in their huddle. Put them under this card until it leaves play. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Potion Commotion
cardText: When this Relic enters play, choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Glass Act
cardText: When this Relic enters play, choose a Penguin and put a vibe counter on it.

name: Easter Island
cardText: Whenever a player plays an Action, that player boosts the vibes of Penguins in their huddle by 1 for the rest of this Cycle. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Leaning Tower
cardText: Flopped Penguins now participate in Vibe Check, and unflopped Penguins do not participate in Vibe Check. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Eiffel Tower
cardText: Enter the Huddle abilities trigger twice. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Pongo
cardText: When Pongo enters the huddle, put 8 vibe counters on it. Pongo doesn't participate in Vibe Check. Whenever you play an Action, remove a vibe counter from Pongo. If it was the last one, search your deck for a Penguin card,

name: Nyan Cat
cardText: When Nyan Cat enters the huddle, put 2 vibe counters on it. Whenever Nyan Cat is flopped, remove a vibe counter from it.

name: Sphinx
cardText: Whenever a Penguin enters a huddle, its controller draws a card. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Great Wall
cardText: Whenever a player plays an Action, that player copies that Action and makes new choices for the copy. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Colosseum
cardText: Players may look at and play the top card of their decks. Players cannot play cards from anywhere else. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Arches
cardText: Whenever a Penguin is flopped, its owner gets a Fishsicle. Whenever another Location enters play, ice this Relic.

name: Parasol Rod
cardText: When this Rod enters play, choose a Rod and unflop it.
